Articles.Content:
i give a hand to floppster

This hand to end this

I cut the finger with The One Ring off.

My finger and evil artifact of Sauron.

free easter eggs eyes.

got only 2 and 20 to type and walk here.

That walk.

I use some clever persuasion (and a few weapons of mass destruction) to get everyone else off the hill and claim it.

My hill.

Electromagnetic... er.. photons disarm all of your WsoMD. I threaten you with some photons that can disarm you too. Literally.

My hill and magic radio wa-photon beams.

I eat the hill.

I am the hill now.

I use photons (again) to upsize you (cause you to explode).

My expanded hill/person (explosion) with a flag sticking out (sticking out of the next user) of it.

I build a new hill on the back of four elephants standing on the shell of an enormous turtle.

My hill.

OK ummm I come down from my mountain home with dreams of calming a hill as mine.

But then I get lost in the fray of the last few posters....so im just going to...

![tumblr_inline_mv6kzaD7u21ql5ohx.gif](https://media.tumblr.com/655c1ae44fbf6792ffb6a3abfebc429e/tumblr_inline_mv6kzaD7u21ql5ohx.gif)

not my weird hill.

I nuke both hills.

Suddenly, the hill of 2012 returns.

No one' shill.

I make a hill with a bunker made out of indestructiblium

My hill

You misspelled Indestrutiblium in your order....you got impodzium instead.....Good by

I then calmly walk up and claim said hill

my hill!

The corrupted chunk deletes you, for you are merely an explosive kerbal/creeper. Not a player.

My zone of doom.

Resetting system...

I reset the hill. My hill.

I dug a hole under your hill in which it sinks.

My sunken hill.

I bury you with dirt and walk away casually.

No one's hill.

I dig a cavern which contains the hill.

My sunken underground cave that's in a manmade cavern.

The sunken hill rises to become a mountain.

Disiuze's mountain, which contains no cavern.

I scale the mountain and plant my flag.

My mountain.

I airstrike you and the flag, then eject and land on the mountain.

My mountain.

I get Chuck Norris to reduce the mountain to rubble. I then sell the rubble to Jeb's Junkyard.

Jeb's mountain of rubble.

Uses the Super Duper Heater 6000 to melt it into on giant rocky mountain.

This here hot mountain is mine.

I cool it down with liquid nitrogen, cooling to a point hell freezes over.

Mguarn's frozen mountain.

I nuke it and then promptly build a space elevator on the site.

My irradiated space elevator.

I pull it into orbit and shred it to pieces

My irradiated kessler syndrome!
